Veterans (8)

I do applied research in workplaces and communities. My research focuses on understanding factors that impact people’s mental health. I draw on organizational psychology, conflict resolution, international affairs, sociology, and other fields.

Currently, I am a Senior Research Associate for the Center for the Advancement of Military and Emergency Services Research (AMES) at Kennesaw State University.
